entry.string: that allows you to assign keywords to module items (taxonomy) and to look up items by keyword. Enable its hooks for any module where you want to use it...

After enabling the keywords hooks for a particular module, you'll see an input box where you can fill in relevant keywords whenever you create or modify a module item. Afterwards, when viewing an item, you can retrieve a list of other items having the same keyword(s).
This module, now, may also restrict keywords to a predefined set of words, tipical for each hooked module.
In the future thi module may try to extract keywords automatically from other fields on create/update. Contributions in that or other directions are welcome :-)
There are no included blocks at this time
Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
